name: Odoo Module Development
description: Expertise in creating and customizing Odoo modules for specific business needs.

name: Odoo Functional Training
description: Comprehensive training in Odoo's functional modules, including CRM, Sales, Inventory, and Accounting, to optimize business processes.

name: Odoo Configuration
description: Proficient in configuring Odoo for various industries, including CRM, Inventory, and Accounting.

name: Python Programming
description: Strong knowledge of Python for backend development, automation, and integration tasks.

name: Odoo API Integration
description: Experience in integrating third-party APIs with Odoo using XML-RPC and RESTful services.

name: Database Management
description: Skilled in managing and optimizing PostgreSQL databases for Odoo applications.

name: Odoo Website Development
description: Capable of developing custom website themes and functionalities using Odoo CMS and QWeb.
